name: ZoomZoom
description:
This is one of my 'Game a Week' projects with the theme of 'Local Multiplayer'; so essentially a week game jam. This is only a prototype, and finishing touches and additions are needed - like a point system and more levels. 

It sadly is multiplayer, and will keep repeating if you lose so unlock your ambidexterity talent if you're by yourself!

(P.S. Make sure you have a numberpad!)

Music credit: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-cyberpunk-vol-1-music-pack-165610#description
